meanings.definition: A person who takes part in an activity or event.
meanings.sent1: The participants in the race were excited to start running.
meanings.sent2: There were many participants in the cooking competition.
meanings.sent3: The participants in the spelling bee were buzzing with anticipation.
meanings.sent4: The participants in the dance class moved as gracefully as swans.
meanings.sent5: The participants in the art workshop created beautiful masterpieces.

meanings.definition: A person who participates in something.
meanings.sent1: All the participants in the meeting shared their ideas.
meanings.sent2: The participants in the study group helped each other understand the material.
meanings.sent3: The participants in the game night had a blast playing together.
meanings.sent4: The participants in the charity event generously donated their time and resources.
meanings.sent5: The participants in the project worked diligently to achieve their goals.
